name: OpenCTI IOC Submission
description: Search and submit OpenCTI Observables and Indicators

options.name: OpenCTI API URL
options.description: The API URL of your OpenCTI instance to include the schema (i.e., https://) and port if applicable

options.name: OpenCTI API Key
options.description: The API Key used for OpenCTI API access

options.name: Exact Match Search
options.description: If checked, the integration will run an exact equality search on the `name`, `value`, or `hash` properties of the indicator or observable as applicable.  Defaults to enabled.  If disabled, the search will be a `contains` search on all fields which can return a large number of results for domain, url, and email searches

options.name: Deletion Permissions
options.description: Control which types of items users can delete from OpenCTI. Defaults to no deletion permissions for security.  This option must be set to "Lock and show option for all users".

options.name: Automatic Relationship Creation
options.description: Control automatic creation of a bidirectional relationship between indicators and observables during submission. This option must be set to "Lock and show option for all users".
